Package com.stormpath.sdk.client

Interface Summary
ApiKey An ApiKey represents a Stormpath customer's API-specific ID and secret.
ApiKeyBuilder A Builder design pattern used to construct ApiKey instances.
Client The Client is the main entry point to the Stormpath Java SDK.
ClientBuilder A Builder design pattern used to construct Client instances.
 

Class Summary
ApiKeys Static utility/helper class for working with ApiKey resources.
ClientApplication Deprecated. in 0.8 and will be removed before 1.0 final.
ClientApplicationBuilder Deprecated. in 0.8 and will be removed before 1.0 final.
Clients Static utility/helper class for working with Client resources.
Proxy HTTP proxy server communication settings, used if the Stormpath SDK Client must communicate through an HTTP Proxy.
 

Enum Summary
AuthenticationScheme Enumeration that defines the available HTTP authentication schemes to be used when communicating with the Stormpath API server.
